actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide benefits for widowed fathers with minor children on the same basis as benefits for widowed mothers with minor children.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide benefits for widowed fathers with minor children on the same basis as benefits for widowed mothers with minor children.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide benefits for widowed fathers with minor children on the same basis as benefits for widowed mothers with minor children.
